languages.text: "Что вы, ни в коей мере". {n}Девушка благосклонно кивает своему молчаливому слуге.{/n} "Просто Уве и в одиночку прекрасно справляется. Он уже привык к моим... моим капризам и предпочтениям".

traits.locale_text: "Что вы, ни в коей мере". {n}Девушка благосклонно кивает своему молчаливому слуге.{/n} "Просто Уве и в одиночку прекрасно справляется. Он уже привык к моим... моим капризам и предпочтениям".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."
languages.original_text: "Что вы, ни в коей мере". {n}Девушка благосклонно кивает своему молчаливому слуге.{/n} "Просто Уве и в одиночку прекрасно справляется. Он уже привык к моим... моим капризам и предпочтениям".

traits.locale_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, nein, das ist es nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Sie nickt ihrem schweigsamen Diener zu.{/n} "Uve ist nur bestens in der Lage, seine Pflichten allein auszuführen. Er ist ... meine Launen und Vorlieben mehr als gewohnt."
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, nein, das ist es nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Sie nickt ihrem schweigsamen Diener zu.{/n} "Uve ist nur bestens in der Lage, seine Pflichten allein auszuführen. Er ist ... meine Launen und Vorlieben mehr als gewohnt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Non, non, il ne s'agit pas du tout de ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Elle hoche la tête cordialement en direction de son serviteur taciturne.{/n} « C'est juste qu'Uve est parfaitement capable d'accomplir ses devoirs seul. Il est habitué à mes... caprices et il connaît mes préférences. »
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

traits.locale_text: « Non, non, il ne s'agit pas du tout de ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Elle hoche la tête cordialement en direction de son serviteur taciturne.{/n} « C'est juste qu'Uve est parfaitement capable d'accomplir ses devoirs seul. Il est habitué à mes... caprices et il connaît mes préférences. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “不不，舰长大人，完全不是这么回事。”{n}她朝旁边沉默不语的男仆亲切地点了点头。{/n}“我只需要乌维一个人就够了。主要是……他习惯于执行我那些天马行空的命令，也了解我的喜好。”
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

traits.locale_text: “不不，舰长大人，完全不是这么回事。”{n}她朝旁边沉默不语的男仆亲切地点了点头。{/n}“我只需要乌维一个人就够了。主要是……他习惯于执行我那些天马行空的命令，也了解我的喜好。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「いいえ、まったくそうではありません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は寡黙な従者に優しく会釈する。{/n}「ウベは自分の任務を単独で行うのがかなり得意というだけです。彼はとても、あたくしの…気まぐれや好みに慣れているのです」
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、まったくそうではありません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は寡黙な従者に優しく会釈する。{/n}「ウベは自分の任務を単独で行うのがかなり得意というだけです。彼はとても、あたくしの…気まぐれや好みに慣れているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No, no, no es eso en absoluto, Lord Capitán». {n}Asiente con gentileza a su taciturno sirviente.{/n} «Es solo que Uve es lo suficientemente competente como para llevar a cabo sus tareas por sí mismo. Está acostumbrado a mis... caprichos y preferencias».
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

traits.locale_text: «No, no, no es eso en absoluto, Lord Capitán». {n}Asiente con gentileza a su taciturno sirviente.{/n} «Es solo que Uve es lo suficientemente competente como para llevar a cabo sus tareas por sí mismo. Está acostumbrado a mis... caprichos y preferencias».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."

languages.text: "Hayır, hayır. Öyle şey olur mu Lord Kaptan." {n}Dilsiz hizmetkârına bakıp candan bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Uve, vazifelerinin üstesinden kendi başına gelebiliyor da ondan. Hem benim huyumu suyumu da iyi biliyor."
languages.original_text: "No, no, it is not that at all, Lord Captain." {n}She nods genially to her taciturn servant.{/n} "It is just that Uve is quite capable of carrying out his duties by himself. He is well accustomed to my... my whims and preferences."
